# atomic-result-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Allow to specify the icon to display from the list of available icons.  By default, will parse the `objecttype` field and the `filetype` field to find a matching icon. If none are available, will use the `custom` icon. | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
